snippet: British officials have refused to hold a public inquiry into the death of the former Russian intelligence officer Alexander V. Litvinenko, a coroner said Friday.
abstract: British officials refuse to hold public inquiry into death of former Russian intelligence officer Alexander V Litvinenko, quashing any hopes of finding out what lay behind the former spy's poisoning in 2006.
lead_paragraph: British officials have refused to hold a public inquiry into the death of the former Russian intelligence officer Alexander V. Litvinenko, a coroner said Friday.

headline.main: No New Inquiry Into Russian Spy’s Death
headline.print_headline: Britain: No New Inquiry Into Spy’s Death
